title: How Israeli actions caused famine in Gaza, visualized
author: nashashmi
aiHeadline: How Israeli actions caused famine in Gaza, visualized: Because nothing says 'we care' like a handy infographic of your blockade-induced starvation.

title: Immich v2.0.0 – First stable release
author: Alexvb
aiHeadline: Immich v2.0.0 – First stable release: Finally, after years of beta testing and existential crises, Immich has achieved the pinnacle of software development: stability. Or maybe just less crashing.

title: Signal Protocol and Post-Quantum Ratchets
author: pluto_modadic
aiHeadline: Signal Protocol and Post-Quantum Ratchets: Because nothing says 'secure' like adding quantum mechanics to your messaging app. Now your messages are safe from both hackers and the heat death of the universe.

title: Potential issues in curl found using AI assisted tools
author: robhlam
aiHeadline: Potential issues in curl found using AI assisted tools: Because what did we do before AI? Oh right, we manually found issues in curl by staring at code until our eyes bled. Good times.

title: NL Judge: Meta must respect user's choice of recommendation system
author: mattashii
aiHeadline: NL Judge: Meta must respect user's choice of recommendation system: Because apparently, even Meta can't ignore the fact that users might actually want control over their own feeds. Shocking.
